alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Hale; Perry; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chilton, south central Tuscaloosa, northern Perry, northeastern Hale and Bibb Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 432 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds along a line extending from near Lay Lake Dam to 6 miles southeast of Shelton State Community College. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Brent, Centreville, Jemison, Thorsby, Maplesville, Billingsley, Gap Of The Mountain, Parnell, Verbena, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Low Gap, Mertz, Talladega National Forest, Eoline, Pooles Crossroads, West Centreville, Heiberger, Plecher and Lawley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and west central Alabama.
